text: Ko si ibawi fun awon tâ€™o gbagbo ni ododo, ti won si sise rere nipa ohun ti won je (ninu ounje siwaju ofin) nigba ti won ba ti beru Allahu, ti won si gbagbo ni ododo, ti won tun sise rere, leyin naa, ti won beru Allahu, ti won si gbagbo ni ododo, leyin naa, ti won beru Allahu, ti won tun sise rere. Allahu si feran awon oluse-rere
